description: A waypoint is a location that ships can travel to such as a Planet, Moon or Space Station.

systemSymbol.description: The symbol of the system this waypoint belongs to.

x.description: Relative position of the waypoint on the system's x axis. This is not an absolute position in the universe.

y.description: Relative position of the waypoint on the system's y axis. This is not an absolute position in the universe.

orbits.description: The symbol of the parent waypoint, if this waypoint is in orbit around another waypoint. Otherwise this value is undefined.
